website_summaries.verdict: These copper-infused support sleeves help support aching arches and relieve plantar fasciitis pain. They work best, however, on average-sized feet.
pros: Compression supports plantar fasciitis, fallen arches, flat feet, and heel spurs
Infused with  30 percent copper for pain relieving properties
Hand wash with mild, soapy water and air dry flat
Do not fall off or slide when running
cons: 1-size fits all, so do not work as well for wide, very small, or very large feet

customer_reviews.title: This works.
customer_reviews.text: I work retail and am on my feet a lot. I've been having pain on my right foot for weeks. Looked and found these. I pop them on after work for a few hours or while I sleep and it helps so much with the pain. I love them. Also. I wear size 11 in women's and have wide feet and they fit great
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Try them. You wont be sorry!
customer_reviews.text: I dont write many reviews. However this product deserves 5 stars hands down! I am 60 years old and Ive been suffering from plantar fasciitis and achilles tendonitis for 4 months now and its been getting increasingly worse. Pain disappeared the very 1st day I wore them! Been wearing only 3 days so dont know if they will continue to help but they certainly are worth a try!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Realistic Expectations
customer_reviews.text: I’m a big dude, (300lbs+) and I have low arches. It’s the perfect combination for foot/ankle pain at the end of the day. I ordered these after seeing the ads online and I’ve worn them twice. (Just washed them). Life changing? No. Life improving? Marginally better. The support is subtle, the bands provide a very light squeeze around my size 13 feet. I found them comfortable to wear all day, and the normal aches and pains at the end of the day seemed to be reduced. Compression bands aren't going to fix me, but for the money, give’em a try. Every little bit helps!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn D. Sexton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These actually work! I wear them every day and only take them off at bedtime.
customer_reviews.author: Vegamin

customer_reviews.title: A Dumb product
customer_reviews.text: This is a highly flawed product. A good idea ruined by stupidity. The simple failure is that it is not at all adjustable. It ends up being far too tight and becomes painful after just a short period of wear. The wrap is tiny, tight, and the elastic is restricting, not forgiving - it lacks play. I reverted to using ace bandages - with all their shortcomings - and found them to be at least a useable solution. But this product is just dumb - a pain causing "pain reliever". I'm sure there must be velcro-type wraps out there; look for one of those or use an ace bandage. Don't waste your money on this. '
customer_reviews.author: Charles Dawson

customer_reviews.title: It actually works!
customer_reviews.text: After 30 years of a job that requires walking, bending and squatting the plantar fasciitis was getting the best of me. It was very hard to walk, I used these and I felt better immediately. After a month of wearing everyday the pain is gone. I still wear them if I'm walking a lot or squatting and bending. Thank for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Gary D

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: These are very large. They don’t stay on my feet at all! I want to return them but it says ineligible for return and when I clicked on”return policy” it was just Amazon’s generic explanation for dozens of different types of returns. I looked back at the item to see if I missed where it said that it couldn’t be returned but I couldn’t find that important info anywhere. I would not have purchased them if I had known! Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I received this Monday, immediately put them on. The relief was almost instant but still felt a bit of pain. The next 3 days I have worn them all day except when I shower or sleep. OMG I almost pain free. My left foot always hurt more than the right and now neither hurt. The pain in my heels was like a burning sensation and now it is gone as well. So happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: 4oh8Mommy

customer_reviews.title: I do not like the fact that they are 'one size'
customer_reviews.text: I do not like the fact that they are 'one size'. When I slipped the band on my foot there was no compression. I don't feel like there is enough compression in these bands for a narrow foot. I wore them twice and haven't worn them since. I was very disappointed.... I was looking forward to being able to wear them with flip flops since they didn't cover the entire foot but sadly they did nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Snug fit~accurate description
customer_reviews.text: Product fit snug on my foot. I’m happy that the description was very accurate. Can’t wait to see how it continues to wear!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: This product works as described
customer_reviews.text: The product is easy to use. It work equally well in dress shoe/sock as it does with Work boots, or sneakers. Easy to use slip on over your socks and that is it. It is noticeable soon after wearing the arche supports that they are effective, as the pain does not develop, or if it is already present, it soon dissipates. Only negative I have noticed is the first set began to come unraveled at the seam the first 1/4 inch section. Not sure if it was a one off quality defect, but have continued using and could easily re-stich the item.
customer_reviews.author: RPN

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because I was tired of wrapping my foot after my cast came off. I broke my third metatarsal and was still dealing with pain after the cast was removed. The wrappings kept stretching out/getting dirty. These are like a permanently tight-fitting wrap that offers great support after a mid-foot brake. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Alise C

customer_reviews.title: The brace offered no support at all and was so tight that it was painful to wear
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for additional support when it is necessary to be on my feet for a few hours without sitting. The brace offered no support at all and was so tight that it was painful to wear. I'm 6'4'' , weigh 200 lbs and wear a size 13D shoe. Perhaps the support is designed for a smaller foot or a lighter weight body.
customer_reviews.author: HezMan

customer_reviews.title: Theses do help but....
customer_reviews.text: So I have plantar fasciitis and years ago I had the surgery on both feet. Well, it appears it can return so have been having pain in my feet again. Not doing surgery again and was looking for alternative. These do provide some comfort from the pain. The only thing I don’t like is that these are one size fits all so I’m a small person, small feet and they don’t stay in place. I re ordered from another seller a small. With socks on they do okay but this seller should get different sizes. Otherwise they are pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Good support
customer_reviews.text: Provides good arch support as advertised, but I could only wear these 8 hours at a time because the tightness hurt my feet after awhile. I did purchase a second pair and do recommend these for those who prefer to be barefoot as much as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Using them for long runs 2 months now!  Super happy!
customer_reviews.text: I was a skeptic.... but these footiu bands have worked wonders with my plantar fasciitis. I still treat the foot with regular stretching and ball exercises, but since using these footiu it’s unbelievable how much they’ve minimized the pain. I wear them with all of my low arch shoes, and when I run. 5k, 10k and Half marathon all done with these bad-boys on my feet. Don’t smell, still have good compression, and not blistering. Using them in training for an Ironman now... So glad I found them. Thank you Footiu!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley X.

customer_reviews.title: Poor brace
customer_reviews.text: The product description is not correct, as it does get loose so I wear over the socks when I go for my walks or gym exercise, and then it feels snug. I have flat arch feet and pain on bottom and also stretched my extensor tendons. The compression brace is not that helpful - at least it does not work for me ??? Would recommend people to look for some other thing so they dont waste money. Otherwise, the material is nice and properly stitched but does not provide functional relief.
customer_reviews.author: sz

customer_reviews.title: Way too tight!
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping these would work out for my injured right foot. However, upon wearing them, they were way too tight. I do wear a women's 10W shoe, so I would advise anyone with a larger foot, such as mine, not to purchase these sleeves. I could only wear them about ten minutes before I had to remove them, I could tell immediately that they were far too tight. Can't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Grandmapink

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: These are super great of you have plantar fasciitis. I purchased the boot and it did nothing for me and even hurt. I purchased these and when I put them on from a long day of working they almost instantly relieve pain. I’ve also worn them with shoes that I know will hurt my feet and by the end of the day my feet aren’t hurting. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: A great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Wow - I am so impressed with these! I wasn't expecting much since I've tried a lot of different things to alleviate my foot pain, but I was pleasantly surprised. It has become an annoying decision every morning what shoes to wear and what will be comfortable. I love wearing my Uggs because they are super comfy, but they're so flat and that kills my feet and my plantar fasciitis. Wearing the bands while wearing my Uggs today and I have zero pain! They even took away the pain I woke up with this morning. Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Contini

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: These have saved my feet! I have very high arches, and wearing high heels is incredibly painful, especially if the shoes have no arch support already. I was tired of constantly purchasing new inserts for every pair of shoes, so I decided to give these a try. They have seriously changed my life. I can easily use them with any pair on heels, and they are small enough to tuck away in my suitcase for when I travel.
customer_reviews.author: Coral

customer_reviews.title: Absolute life savers!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these when I was having my first terrible bout with plantar fascitis. It was agony to walk in the morning or after long periods of sitting. You can feel them on your feet, but you get used to it pretty quickly. And the relief you get from this type of support makes it all worthwhile. I'm going to buy another pair so I always have at least one pair handy. They are small little suckers, so it's not hard to picture one going under the bed or the dresser. And they're so reasonable, I may buy two more pair! Highly recommend for relief of foot pain!
customer_reviews.author: kimberleem

customer_reviews.title: Not good, for me
customer_reviews.text: I was trying to find assistance with Plantar Faucitis. They gave me a very short duration of help with the pain, but within an hour they created pain of their own. The pain they created was intense and took about a half hour to subside after I removed them. They didn't work for me, but I can see where they might for someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Brian W. King

customer_reviews.title: Horrible for arch support
customer_reviews.text: I was told that I have normal arches that flatten out when I walk and to get support for that. I got these for walking barefoot without supportive shoes on. I soon started feeling very sharp, painful pain in the bones of my feet. My podiatrist told me the compression of these was pushing the bones together and pinching on nerves. These may be good for someone who needs compression but if you don't, do not buy these. I had to start massaging my feet and working the bones back away from each other to relieve the pain.
customer_reviews.author: D. M. Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Simple design that really works!
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with these. Have a sleek fit and go into shoes/sandals easily. No pads, no fasteners, just slide over your feet so you can place them in the area that you need. Will probably buy at least one other set, in order to wash them as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila P.

customer_reviews.title: Reviews convinced me
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure how these small wraps were supposed to resolve my chronic foot pain from plantar fasciitis, but the solid reviews convinced me to give them a try. They are snug without being too tight, and almost immediately my feet felt better. No more soreness or stabbing pain, no more aching. I might even buy a second pair for when these are being washed!
customer_reviews.author: Kae Winters

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in timely manner. I only wear braces during ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in timely manner. I only wear braces during sleep. I often need to remove at some point, due to pressure discomfort - early a.m., before rising, but a couple of times made it to morning. As a Letter Carrier, I tried one day wearing braces, but needed to remove after brief time, due to squeezing discomfort, so only during sleep now. PF pain is decreased since wearing, but not a magic cure-all.
customer_reviews.author: Vijabe

customer_reviews.title: So glad I got these
customer_reviews.text: I recently started having some heel/foot pain which I believe is plantar fasciitis. Upon researching my options for pain relief I decided to give these arch supports a try, & I'm so glad I did. After a couple of days of wearing them with my shoes I noticed a big difference in my pain level. Yes, there is still tenderness but these have made a big difference & for 10$ they're definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: shauna

customer_reviews.title: I like the support
customer_reviews.text: I do notice a difference when I wear these. I like to wear Cobian's Bounce flip flops w/ slight arch support around the house. I put these bands around my arches when I'm wearing the flip flops while doing chores, etc. I like the support they give. I wear them at night as well.
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: Foot pain relieved in seconds!
customer_reviews.text: I was happy to spend some of my Christmas money on something to help my feet. Just took them out of the package, slipped them on, and could almost immediately tell a difference! The compression is not too strong to where Iose circulation. It’s perfect! I prepared for the usual pain when I stood up, and it wasn’t even noticeable!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hunsucker

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Add a but of support to my arches, giving me minor relief but not complete like I read in other reviews. Easy to sleep with, so I should probably just stick with that until I'm completely healed. Doesnt look horrible with sandals, fits well in shoes, and over sock. Notice minor difference in PF which is why I rated it so many stars
customer_reviews.author: RGRIFFIN0311

customer_reviews.title: After 8 months still providing feet pain relief.
customer_reviews.text: Been using them for 6+ months and they still providing excellent feet pain relief. I used the compression socks first but they made my feet so uncomfortable. I put these over my socks, every day for first 2-3 weeks and they seriously made the difference. Now only wear one/3-4 days and they providing all the support still. Really have been surprised and now since it has been 8 months or more, I could not recommend anything besides this!
customer_reviews.author: RYJMO1

customer_reviews.title: Arch Support
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from severe plantar fasciitis and have very high arches. This has really helped with the pain in my arch. I still have issues with pain in my heel and my foot doctor has taken impressions for custom orthodics to wear as well. I am hoping that with the custom otho's and the arch support that I will begin living pain free soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kind of a disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from planter fasciitis on my left foot and bought these after all the rave reviews. Unfortunately, these aren't working so well for me. Maybe I'm not wearing them right or long enough, or too long of a time period? I wear them when playing tennis and exercising, but it's not relieving any pain in my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Tara K Brill

customer_reviews.title: Wore quick and no response from support.
customer_reviews.text: They fit great but after wearing twice the seam split open on one. Wrote an email to support as the card included said they wanted to know if there were any issues. No response and its been over a week. If they had responded quickly to the email I may have a different opinion but cannot leave good feedback with a product that fails quickly and no customer support.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a bunch of hooey
customer_reviews.text: I’m almost 9 mo tha pregnant and was looking for some relief for my feet with all the weight gain. This product didn’t do anything for me. I got some orthopedic shoes with arch support and that helped a lot more.
customer_reviews.author: emsplice

customer_reviews.title: They need some getting used to but they’re great
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend for plantar relief. My husband still has pain but it has decreased substantially since wearing the compression bands. He says they are hard to get used to wearing because they’re tight, hence “compression”. But I imagine these coupled with a good pair of arch support insoles, you’d be walking on sunshine! I highly recommend these for temporary relief.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and durable
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable to wear and durable. I do karate and these help support my arches since I’m not wearing shoes. My feet are a little wide and these are snug but not too tight. I wish it put a little more pressure on my arches, but it does the job and it’s one of the most comfortable supports I’ve tried.
customer_reviews.author: Heather H

customer_reviews.title: Slides all over my feet
customer_reviews.text: Just got them and when wearing them with flip flop they’re already sliding all over. They feel nice but don’t do much good when I’m moving around. I’m holding out hope that wearing them at night will help over time. We’ll see
customer_reviews.author: Megan Benterou

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable, and they really work!
customer_reviews.text: These work so well, and are comfortable all day long. Most of the pharmacy sold supports, compress the ankle, heel and arch, which causes discomfort as the day progresses, but not these! The doctor told me that I needed surgery for heel spurs - total bunk, what I needed was these sleeves.
customer_reviews.author: The Seeker

customer_reviews.title: You will be amazed....relief within hours!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed at how quickly I began to feel relief. Wore it to bed last night and didn’t worry about not being able to walk to the bathroom in the middle of the night. I used to wake up with foot and leg pain, but no more night pain. Don’t get me wrong.....these are not a cure all. But I at least feel like I can function again. Wish I would have known about them months ago
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product works!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these prior to going on a Disney 4 day vacation! I loved them! I stood in 30-40 minute lines and walked around Disney 12 hour days for 3 days, one day of rest and these made a difference in my feet compared to just last year with the same type activity! Thank you to a product that did what it advertised!!!
customer_reviews.author: TeacherMom

customer_reviews.title: This product has no copper anywhere. I have tested it.
customer_reviews.text: Where's the COPPER?? This is only a spandex strap. Good for compression, but don't expect anything more. There is 0% copper in this product, but fortunately for the manufacturer, China doesn't have false advertising regulations.
customer_reviews.author: Scott - PRO

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great relief, been big assist to my arch support. Delivered fast!
customer_reviews.author: Paul S. Brady

customer_reviews.title: THESE WORK OMG
customer_reviews.text: This has been so helpful to wear with shoes that dont have enough arch support or to yoga/pilates or any workout class to save my feet. Instant relied. Highly recommend These do stretch out over time but they are not expensive so its worth it
customer_reviews.author: JRWe

customer_reviews.title: Not tight enough if you have boney feet
customer_reviews.text: Fabric is very comfortable to wear. But it's not tight enough for me. I wish it has smaller sizes. They will slide forward as I walk, then they are not stabilizing my arch anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing to say the least :(
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing to say the least...provides no more support than a compression sock. I have narrow feet and doesn’t fit tight enough to make a difference. Good quality but just isn’t what I need to help with my plantar fasciitis.
customer_reviews.author: garys*gal

customer_reviews.title: a help for plantar faciitis
customer_reviews.text: These are a big help to help prevent and provide some relief when you have plantar faciitis issues. My only complaint is that if the bands were a bit narrower, it would be much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: P. K. Gresenz

customer_reviews.title: Helpful after getting flat feet after pregnancy.
customer_reviews.text: I’m happy so far. I ended up with flat feet after having my second kid and my feet were really starting to hurt. These seem to help support my arches throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Vang

customer_reviews.title: Wish these had worked.
customer_reviews.text: Tried these out for a few weeks for poor arch issues among a few others. Seemed that at first they were helping, but it didn't last. Not saying it's a bad product as foot and arch support is different with each person, however, they didn't work for me
customer_reviews.author: Saltwater Maestro

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got these
customer_reviews.text: I’m 30 weeks pregnant and I can’t get through a day without my arches hurting. I bought these and they work great. I use them barefoot or in shoes. My arches don’t even hurt at the end of the day! My only complaint is that they slide down and I have to constantly adjust them so I took off 1 star for that. It’s minor though considering the relief I get.
customer_reviews.author: Amit&Jenn

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This did actually help with my plantar pain. I am extremely flat footed and I have big feet (size 12 women's)and it did cut into my foot, especially by the evening when my feet swell but I definitely could tell the difference from a day I didn't wear it to a day that I did.Foot felt better the next day in the morning after wearing it the day before and took it off at night.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Schuler

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I have planters fasciitis and sometimes inserts won't help. These give great support but are not too tight. I wear these every day now over my socks. I can walk well over 10,000 steps a day now, when before I could barely do 5000. MUST HAVE if you have plantars fasciitis.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Walker

customer_reviews.title: I know why this WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: Because you are forced to curl your feet (providing a natural arch) which means you refrain from walking flat-footed. This practice yields immediate results. Add stretching of the calves, massage and you should be free of pain.
customer_reviews.author: Erwin Hero

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: honestly, not super ecstatic about these. I had flat feet and am on my feet ALLLLLLL day slaving away to pay the bills! they are comfy to walk around in but are not comfy with shoes on- especially anything tight.
customer_reviews.author: Alemo212

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I have ended up giving one of the pair to my daughter. These help a great deal with joint pain in our feet. Will buy another pair!
customer_reviews.author: Kathi R.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on time and I was happy with the packaging. However when I opened it I noticed both the sleeves had some fraying. So I got my lighter and burned off the excess fray so it wouldn’t spread. I’ve had them now for about a week or 2. They seem to hold up well and do provide support and comfort. I only use them a few times a week. Trying to use them more though.
customer_reviews.author: AMBER NATALI

customer_reviews.title: Too loose- No compression
customer_reviews.text: These were not snug on my feet. They were too loosed to be effective. I felt no difference with my plantar fasciitis. I paid $10 and it's $6 to return them so I guess they'll be donated.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Does help.
customer_reviews.text: These may not be the miracle you are looking for, but they definitely helped with my plantar fasciitis. The only complaint is on one of them (where the seem is) started to come apart...A couple of stitches and it is fine...
customer_reviews.author: Helen am I

customer_reviews.title: Powerful sleeves!
customer_reviews.text: I never knew that a product like this can help with my plantar fasciitis. I literally have relief once I put them on. They may feel uncomfortable at first, but let me tell you, my heels of both feet feel great. No pain. I even wear these inside my shoes. Give them a try and feel the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Vibeone2002

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: These braces did not help relief any pain was so ever in my feet. They might work for someone else, but for me they did not. Wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and helpful for foot pain
customer_reviews.text: Loved having these for treating foot pain. They are great to wear with any shoes and not too tight or constricting. Helpful for treating plantar fasciitis
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I have plantar fasciitis and wake up in the morning in excruciating pain. I’m hoping that these will help, along with exercise and ice therapy. So far I can feel the compression on my instep. Keeping my fingers crossed they help.
customer_reviews.author: Whatever It’s my opinion

customer_reviews.title: Immediate Difference!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these bands to help with my plantar fasciitis. They really help! What’s more, they stretch nicely around my wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: Sara M. Urbano

customer_reviews.title: Great if you love the feeling of someone trying to choke your foot
customer_reviews.text: I am flat footed so these "hug" my foot pretty tight. Feels good for my feet, but it will be different for everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon and MelisaTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and nice item.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable. Might be better if they had different sizes. I have less pain now in the mornings. Not sure if it is related to this or all the other things i have been doing to easy the pain such as night splint, stretching amd the cortizone shot i got.
customer_reviews.author: hulagu

customer_reviews.title: didnt really fit
customer_reviews.text: im not really sure it did much to me, especially since i have small feet and they didnt really compress them as much as id like, but i could see this working for someone with bigger feet
customer_reviews.author: kaylie

customer_reviews.title: Barefoot and loving it
customer_reviews.text: I haven't taken these off since I got them except to shower and sleep. I have planter's facilities. Walking around bare foot was almost impossible. My right foot has what I call a blow out on the inside right at my arch. I can't even feel any pain from it after wearing these !!! Fits comfortably in my shoes also.
customer_reviews.author: Candi Happy

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Bands!
customer_reviews.text: These were recommended from a friend to help treat my daughter's severe arch pain and they are magic!!! If you struggle with Plantar Fasciitis, I highly recommend getting these. My daughter wears them 24 hours a day and the paid has completely disappeared.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Idk if they work
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband as he has plantar fasciitis, but he also has very wide feet & these did not work for him.
customer_reviews.author: david erik crumpton

customer_reviews.title: Too tight
customer_reviews.text: These are so tight and I have thin feet. Very painful to wear!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie L. Riley

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable with shoes and socks
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable and great to wear with both socks and shoes. One complaint is that the seams began to fall apart after one week of heavy usage. I still wear them weeks later but I had hoped they lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda BN

customer_reviews.title: Help but don't cure
customer_reviews.text: They help with plantair fascitis but are certainly not a cure. Don't get me wrong, they keep arch tight(not to tight as I can wear all day) For sure they are better than nothing and cost very little. I will recommend
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: My feet hurt no more.
customer_reviews.text: I stand on my feet all day and these are perfect for easing the pain associated with that. If you have plantar fasciitis then I strongly suggest getting these.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: this does indeed make my foot feet better, however, it slips down ALL DAY. I'm constantly having to pull it back up. It's fine if you are not moving around but once you start walking it slides down. I am disappointed that I am unable to return this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Help solve my foot issues!
customer_reviews.text: This product has been marvelous! I helped my foot issues and so easy to slip on. So happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: These have not worked for me. They fit well, but I have not felt any relief for my plantar fasciitis.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much useless
customer_reviews.text: Whatever this thing was supposed to do it failed miserably. Didn't even help with any foot pain, pretty much useless.
customer_reviews.author: M. Al-hayder

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical that these would help the plantar fasciitis pain in my feet, but for the price, I thought I'd give them a try. I am in love! I cannot believe how much better I feel - foot pain was reduced to practically nothing while I was wearing them and even after I took them off, my feet felt far better than before.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for teachers
customer_reviews.text: I have high archers. I stand on my feet all day because I’m a teacher. These area perfect for those shoes where my arch inserts don’t fit in the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Summers

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay in place.
customer_reviews.text: Slips toward toes. Doesn't stay in arch well. I kept pulling it back into my arch and it would slide down within minutes. I wear a size 8 shoe so I know it's not because my foot is small. I wore it today but it gave no support just aggravation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Have suffered from Plantear Fasciae Pain for several months. This band is comfortable to wear, fits in shoes and really works to help eliminate the pain.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Kellogg

customer_reviews.title: If your feet ache, you need these
customer_reviews.text: If you have aching feet, this is a must!! I wear these everyday! I have a high arch and my feet are not supported in flats. These help give me support.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Caniglia

customer_reviews.title: Double up on one foot for more width
customer_reviews.text: Just received today, the bands seem firm/ supportive enough however, they seem narrow. I’m using two bands on one foot and it feels appropriate for my needs . It seems like a slightly wider sleeve would be more efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Kris P.

customer_reviews.title: They do support my ankle & foot
customer_reviews.text: They do a nice job of supporting my ankle and food. I wear them at bedtime. I recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence C White

customer_reviews.title: True Buy
customer_reviews.text: This band truly works. I had plantar faciatis and I can’t wear flat shoes but this I can if I wear this band it truly relieves the foot ..you get two bands
customer_reviews.author: Bessence

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I have boughten several of different ones and this one seems to work the best for me,
customer_reviews.author: wbwh

customer_reviews.title: Great support, poor durability
customer_reviews.text: I have flat feet, so this made my feet feel amazing after day 1. They work great and make my foot pain almost non-existent. However, after day 1, the seams on 1 of them started to break down and stretch out. Now, a couple weeks later, both of them are stretched out and no longer provide great support. If durability were improved, this would easily be a 5 start product.
customer_reviews.author: Noah S.

customer_reviews.title: Work well.
customer_reviews.text: I like the way these support my instep but I had thick feet so I can’t wear them all day without them hurting.
customer_reviews.author: Junie Harlow

customer_reviews.title: Check your shoe size.
customer_reviews.text: They were not tight enough for my feet so they wouldn’t work for me (size 6). They worked great for my son (size 11) and he really like them.
customer_reviews.author: Kathia Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to wear. Comfort. Walking is no longer painful.  Thanks. footiu!!❤
customer_reviews.text: Love this product !! It works !! I have fallen arches. Tried everything. This is amazing. Very comfortable. Just the right compression. I am on my feet all the time. No more cramping , foot pain. I am wearing my boots now. I can even wesr them with my sandals. I will definitely be buying products in this line .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: This has really helped my arch pain. I only wear it when I’m sleeping or in non-supporting shoes. I would buy these again. Easy to wash.
customer_reviews.author: CraftyKitty

customer_reviews.title: life saver!!
customer_reviews.text: i have tried everything for my painful foot. have had shots..have had many...many braces. i thought what could i lose in trying these....i cant believe this little prduct has solved my foot pain. i have bursitis...plantar fasciitis...and bone spurs all in one foot.
customer_reviews.author: Karen B.

customer_reviews.title: Quality product. Recommend that you do not self-diagnose heel pain.
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. BUT I highly recommend you see a doctor if you are having heel pain. The quicker the better - you can do permanent nerve damage if you wait too long. Check out "tarsal tunnel syndrome" on-line.
customer_reviews.author: P. Specht

customer_reviews.title: Planter facitis
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if these are the reason why my feet are feeling better but I have planter facitis in both feet and ever since I've been wearing them my feet don't hurt as bad. I wear them day and night. My feet still hurt but not as bad so I hope I'm on the mend.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Ashlock

customer_reviews.title: BUY THEM
customer_reviews.text: I work retail and walk 8+ miles at work daily. These are amazing, legs aren't fatigued at the end of the day no matter what shoes I wear. Sandals, boots, tennis shoes, anything works with them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Felt comforting and feel that it helped speed up my healing time from a tendon tear.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Harless

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Got these, wore for one day and one ripped apart at the seam. Not pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Sumac

customer_reviews.title: Provides support right where I need it
customer_reviews.text: I broke my foot last year, so my foot is still a little sore in specific shoes that don't have much structure. These little braces are effective and washable - perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Julie B-L

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I thought these might help a tiny bit, but would give me lots of pain in my feet, no, just the opposite. Granted it's the first day, but I wore these to the gym today and was actually in zero pain. I them worked my way around the kitchen for 45 minutes which would normally put me in excruciating pain, today I feel fantastic! I would HIGHLY recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Bryant

product_meta.title: FOOTIU Compression Copper Arch Support Brace - 2 Plantar Fasciitis Sleeves for Pain Relief, Heel Spurs and Flat Feet
product_meta.description: If plantar faciitis is making it hard for you to get up and active in the morning, FOOTIU arch support braces can bring much needed relief. We infuse our athletic support bandages with 30% copper for superior pain relieving properties. Copper has been shown to relieve pain and stiffness by opening the flow of blocked energy and helping prevent wear, tear and calcification of the joints. Compression provides support for fallen arches, flat feet, plantar faciitis, heel spurs. Wear under socks and shoes, sandals, slippers, during exercise, when hiking, running, playing tennis, doing yoga, or even over night. For men, women, and youth. Hand wash with mild, soapy water. Air dry flat. Scroll up and "Add to Cart" to order yours today!
feature_bullets: Breathable elastic athletic arch support sleeve cushions and relieves plantar fasciitis pain.
30% copper content helps improve blood circulation, reduce inflammation, and increase energy
Snug, comfort fit band provides gentle compression & relief for flat feet and heel discomfort
Anti-itch, anti-bacterial, odor-free construction wicks moisture for all day or all night wear.
The best arch support brace material quality on the market.
